text: 11.8: Ais 1.9-10; Ru 13.34; Hi 13.12; VB 14.8; 18.10; 18.24Ana mani shogirim, mani rimgirga, manin khumani ŋgu bakɨmen tuav bakɨme rɨgɨp kɨrga. Nza mba ŋgu bakɨme vhunama sav, khaŋ nzuai, Sodom o Idzɨp. Mbe mba ŋgu bakɨmera fhum mani Guma Bakɨme ndi khanarareŋ ga ntorgap, ana shogim, ana rimgi.
